item.title: By: Spoopy A. E. Ash
item.dc:creator: Spoopy A. E. Ash
item.content:encoded:
Fantastic interview! Thank you so much for posting this–I’ll be sure to share with all my writerly friends who are interested in NA! ^_^

And this…”I love revision!!!!! The magic that happens in that step blows my mind.
Good blossoms to great. Intention blossoms to realization. Wordy turns
to crisp and accessible.”

I sometimes feel like a weirdo for gleefully reveling in edits and rewrites. It’s just so *gratifying* to watch something rough-hewn and blocky take on that sheen of edit-polish. Magic, yes. Alchemy, transmutation, something. ðŸ˜€
